snippet: Connecticut prosecutors appealed to the state Supreme Court late on Friday to reinstate Kennedy cousin Michael Skakel's 2002 conviction on a charge of murdering his neighbor when they were both 15. A state judge overturned verdict last year....

headline.print_headline: Prosecutors Fight Kennedy Cousin's Overturned Murder Conviction
headline.main: Prosecutors Fight Kennedy Cousin's Overturned Murder Conviction

lead_paragraph: Connecticut prosecutors appealed to the state Supreme Court late on Friday to reinstate Kennedy cousin Michael Skakel's 2002 conviction on a charge of murdering his neighbor when they were both 15. A state judge overturned verdict last year.
